name: update global.positionXInPulses
func:
const pulse = flow.get("pulse")
const { count, direction } = pulse

const countVelocity =
  direction === "left"
    ? count
    : direction === "right"
      ? -count
      : 0

const prevPositionX = global.get("positionXInPulses")
const nextPositionX = prevPositionX + countVelocity

global.set("positionXInPulses",  nextPositionX)

return msg

name: ensure safety
sanitize
func:
if (typeof msg.payload !== 'object') return
if (msg.payload.direction !== 'left' && msg.payload.direction !== 'right') return
if (typeof msg.payload.count !== 'number') return

msg.payload.count = Math.round(msg.payload.count)
msg.payload.speed = msg.payload.speed || "slow"

return msg

name: convert meters to pulses
ensure safety
sanitize
func:
if (typeof msg.payload !== 'object') return
if (msg.payload.direction !== 'up' && msg.payload.direction !== 'down') return

return msg

name: only one input at a time
HACK: allow time for Move Y to reset
gate auto closes after every message
